title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract, and beat until well combined.
Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture, stirring until just combined.
Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until lightly golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.
